page.title: 14Tourism Around Rhenigidale
page.content: The Rhenigidale hostel is open all year round for visitors but during the months of October _ April it is partially used as a store for feeding stuffs. Most hikers stay 1 or 2 nights but there are some who stay longer. While they are here some want to climb Toddun or explore the hills and valleys around the village. Many of the hostellers who stay for a few days like to help in the work around the village _ whether it is dipping or shearing sheep, fencing or just meeting the boat and helping to carry the supplies that arrive at the jetty. Day trippers come too. Some walk in and go to the hostel and have a drink and some bring picnics and sit outside maybe taking photographs before walking back to Tarbert. No matter how miserable the weather there is always someone on the path.
